meanings.definition: The quality or state of being convertible.
meanings.sent1: Her convertiblenesses made her a great team player.
meanings.sent2: The convertiblenesses of the material allowed for easy customization.
meanings.sent3: His convertiblenesses in trying new things always led to interesting outcomes.
meanings.sent4: The convertiblenesses of the situation turned it into a learning opportunity.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's convertiblenesses inspired creativity in the students.

meanings.definition: The ability to be converted or changed into something else.
meanings.sent1: The convertiblenesses of the currency made trading easier.
meanings.sent2: She admired the convertiblenesses of the old building into a modern office space.
meanings.sent3: The convertiblenesses of the ingredients in the recipe surprised the chef.
meanings.sent4: His mind had the convertiblenesses of a chameleon, adapting to any situation.
meanings.sent5: The convertiblenesses of the software allowed for seamless integration with other programs.
